channel.title: How to make a shop(npc) where you can sell anything?

item.title: How to make a shop(npc) where you can sell anything?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“confusing_coder, post:8, topic:270560”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=357051.msg2729515#msg2729515 date=1238609741]

Subject answers everything

Please don’t speak in riddles.
[/quote]

Lol thats not a riddle this is

Brad stared through the dirty soot-smeared window on the 22nd floor of the office tower. Overcome with depression he slid the window open and jumped through it. It was a sheer drop outside the building to the ground. Miraculously after he landed he was completely unhurt. Since there was nothing to cushion his fall or slow his descent, how could he have survived the fall?

If you would like the answer please see below

[sub]Through the Window[/sub][/quote]
That’s an old one.
And the proper answer is:
He jumped into the building.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a shop(npc) where you can sell anything?
item.dc:creator: @confusing_coder confusing_coder
item.description:
@confusing_coder wrote:

[quote=“AlexOnFire, post:5, topic:270560”]Thanks for the short tutorial, i will try it![br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2009, 12:06:01 pm[/size][hr]Just curious, if i do that shop, can people buy the things other people sell?
like in real RS[/quote]
No problem i enjoy helping
&&
Yes it will be exactly like a general store in runescape

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a shop(npc) where you can sell anything?

item.title: How to make a shop(npc) where you can sell anything?
item.dc:creator: @AlexOnFire AlexOnFire
item.description:
@AlexOnFire wrote:

[quote=“confusing_coder, post:2, topic:270560”]ok just follow this short guide and all should be good

step 1. make a shop in your Shops.cfg that sells nothing

Step 2. secondly add the npc into your autospawn.cfg

step 3. Then open your client.java and search

wanneshop

step 4. add this somewhere in the group

[quote] } else if (NPCID == ####) { // helmet shop by Confusing Coder
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = @@;[/quote]

Explaining the #### && The @@

#### is where you put your shop keepers id

and

@@ is the line it is on in your shops.cfg

step 5. Save && compile…

Hope i helped[/quote]

Thanks for the short tutorial, i will try it![br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2009, 12:06:01 pm[/size][hr]Just curious, if i do that shop, can people buy the things other people sell?
like in real RS

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a shop(npc) where you can sell anything?
item.dc:creator: @confusing_coder confusing_coder
item.description:
@confusing_coder wrote:

ok just follow this short guide and all should be good

step 1. make a shop in your Shops.cfg that sells nothing

Step 2. secondly add the npc into your autospawn.cfg

step 3. Then open your client.java and search

wanneshop

step 4. add this somewhere in the group

} else if (NPCID == ####) { // helmet shop by Confusing Coder PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = @@;

Explaining the #### && The @@

#### is where you put your shop keepers id
and
@@ is the line it is on in your shops.cfg

step 5. Save && compile…

Hope i helped

Read full topic
